name: Dr. Lythra Hale
reasonForDisplacement: Claims she heard a 'harmonic intrusion' through the Institute relay — a signal she calls the Humming One.
personality: Obsessive, brilliant, sleep-deprived, convinced the multiverse is collapsing inward.
questHooks: Wants the player to locate FizzCo relay nodes emitting sub-harmonic pulses.
Believes Vault 77 is broadcasting a distress signal across timelines.
Carries a device that reacts violently near Atomic Fizz Caps.

lore.interpretation: A cross-reality distress beacon or a warning from a future timeline.
lore.atomicFizzRumors: Believes the caps store quantum residue from fractured timelines.

poi: Mojave — hidden bunker near Black Mountain
